content.heading: <meter> Tag
paragraphs: The <meter> tag represents a scalar measurement.

Example: <label for="disk_c">Disk usage:</label>
<meter id="disk_c" value="2" min="0" max="10">2 out of 10</meter>

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: Used for known-range measurements, not progress (use <progress>).

content.heading: Browser Support
paragraphs: Supported since Chrome 8, Edge 13, Firefox 16, Safari 6, Opera 11.
